if.test: jdh != null and jdh != '' and orgJgid != '01000000'

mapper.sql: t.jzid jzid, t.jzmc jzmc, t.jzwz jzwz, t.jzsyxz jzsyxz, t.jzjg jzjg, t.gnms gnms, to_char(t2.zdmj,'fm9999999990.00') zdmj, to_char(t2.jzmj,'fm9999999990.00') jzmj, to_char(t2.dsgd,'fm9999999990.00') dsgd, to_char(t2.dxgd,'fm9999999990.00') dxgd, t.dscs dscs, t.dxcs dxcs, t.bnc bnc, t.xqxclx xqxclx, t.yjddsc yjddsc, t.bz bz, t.delete_flag deleteFlag, t.cjrid cjrid, t.cjrmc cjrmc, TO_CHAR(t.cjsj,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') cjsj, t.xgrid xgrid, t.xgrmc xgrmc, TO_CHAR(t.xgsj,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') xgsj, t.datasource datasource, t.jdh jdh, TO_CHAR(t.sjc,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') sjc, t.reserve1 reserve1, t.reserve2 reserve2, t.reserve3 reserve3, TO_CHAR(t.reserve4,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') reserve4
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(0) AS NUM FROM YAGL_JXCS_JZXX t WHERE 1=1 AND DELETE_FLAG = 'N'

SELECT , c2.code_name jzsyxzmc, c4.code_name jzjgmc FROM YAGL_JXCS_JZXX t
Left Join SYS_CODELIST c1 on c1.CODETYPE = 'JZSYXZ' And c1.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' Left Join SYS_CODELIST_DETAIL c2 On c1.CODEID = c2.CODEID And c2.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' and t.jzsyxz = c2.CODE_VALUE
Left Join SYS_CODELIST c3 on c3.CODETYPE = 'JZJG' And c3.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' Left Join SYS_CODELIST_DETAIL c4 On c3.CODEID = c4.CODEID And c4.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' and t.jzjg = c4.CODE_VALUE WHERE t.DELETE_FLAG = 'N'
mapper.insert:
SELECT SYS_GUID() AS jzid FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO YAGL_JXCS_JZXX(jzid,jzmc,jzwz,jzsyxz,jzjg,gnms,zdmj,jzmj,dsgd,dxgd,dscs,dxcs,bnc,xqxclx,yjddsc,bz,delete_flag,cjrid,cjrmc,cjsj,xgrid,xgrmc,xgsj,datasource,jdh,sjc,reserve1,reserve2,reserve3,reserve4) VALUES(#{jzid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{jzmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{jzwz,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{jzsyxz,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{jzjg,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{gnms,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{zdmj,jdbcType=DOUBLE},#{jzmj,jdbcType=DOUBLE},#{dsgd,jdbcType=DOUBLE},#{dxgd,jdbcType=DOUBLE},#{dscs,jdbcType=DOUBLE},#{dxcs,jdbcType=DOUBLE},#{bnc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{xqxclx,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{yjddsc,jdbcType=DOUBLE},#{bz,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'N',#{cjrid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{cjrmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{cjsj,jdbcType=DATE},#{xgrid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{xgrmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{xgsj,jdbcType=DATE},#{datasource,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{jdh,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{sjc,jdbcType=DATE},#{reserve1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{reserve2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{reserve3,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{reserve4,jdbcType=DATE})
mapper.update: UPDATE YAGL_JXCS_JZXX t SET t.DELETE_FLAG = 'Y' WHERE 1=1 AND t.JZID = #{value}

INSERT INTO YAGL_JXCS_JZXX(jzid,jzmc,jzwz,jzsyxz,jzjg,gnms,zdmj,jzmj,dsgd,dxgd,dscs,dxcs,bnc,xqxclx,yjddsc,bz,delete_flag,cjrid,cjrmc,cjsj,xgrid,xgrmc,xgsj,datasource,jdh,sjc,reserve1,reserve2,reserve3,reserve4) VALUES
#{item.jzid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} jzid,#{item.jzmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR} jzmc,#{item.jzwz,jdbcType=VARCHAR} jzwz,#{item.jzsyxz,jdbcType=VARCHAR} jzsyxz,#{item.jzjg,jdbcType=VARCHAR} jzjg,#{item.gnms,jdbcType=VARCHAR} gnms,#{item.zdmj,jdbcType=DOUBLE} zdmj,#{item.jzmj,jdbcType=DOUBLE} jzmj,#{item.dsgd,jdbcType=DOUBLE} dsgd,#{item.dxgd,jdbcType=DOUBLE} dxgd,#{item.dscs,jdbcType=DOUBLE} dscs,#{item.dxcs,jdbcType=DOUBLE} dxcs,#{item.bnc,jdbcType=VARCHAR} bnc,#{item.xqxclx,jdbcType=VARCHAR} xqxclx,#{item.yjddsc,jdbcType=DOUBLE} yjddsc,#{item.bz,jdbcType=VARCHAR} bz,'N' delete_flag,#{item.cjrid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} cjrid,#{item.cjrmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR} cjrmc,#{item.cjsj,jdbcType=DATE} cjsj,#{item.xgrid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} xgrid,#{item.xgrmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR} xgrmc,#{item.xgsj,jdbcType=DATE} xgsj,#{item.datasource,jdbcType=VARCHAR} datasource,#{item.jdh,jdbcType=VARCHAR} jdh,#{item.sjc,jdbcType=DATE} sjc,#{item.reserve1,jdbcType=VARCHAR} reserve1,#{item.reserve2,jdbcType=VARCHAR} reserve2,#{item.reserve3,jdbcType=VARCHAR} reserve3,#{item.reserve4,jdbcType=DATE} reserve4
ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE jzid = VALUES(jzid), jzmc = VALUES(jzmc), jzwz = VALUES(jzwz), jzsyxz = VALUES(jzsyxz), jzjg = VALUES(jzjg), gnms = VALUES(gnms), zdmj = VALUES(zdmj), jzmj = VALUES(jzmj), dsgd = VALUES(dsgd), dxgd = VALUES(dxgd), dscs = VALUES(dscs), dxcs = VALUES(dxcs), bnc = VALUES(bnc), xqxclx = VALUES(xqxclx), yjddsc = VALUES(yjddsc), bz = VALUES(bz), delete_flag = VALUES(delete_flag), cjrid = VALUES(cjrid), cjrmc = VALUES(cjrmc), cjsj = VALUES(cjsj), xgrid = VALUES(xgrid), xgrmc = VALUES(xgrmc), xgsj = VALUES(xgsj), datasource = VALUES(datasource), jdh = VALUES(jdh), sjc = VALUES(sjc), reserve1 = VALUES(reserve1), reserve2 = VALUES(reserve2), reserve3 = VALUES(reserve3), reserve4 = VALUES(reserve4)
mapper.select:
SELECT , c2.code_name jzsyxzmc, c4.code_name jzjgmc FROM YAGL_JXCS_JZXX t
Left Join SYS_CODELIST c1 on c1.CODETYPE = 'JZSYXZ' And c1.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' Left Join SYS_CODELIST_DETAIL c2 On c1.CODEID = c2.CODEID And c2.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' and t.jzsyxz = c2.CODE_VALUE
Left Join SYS_CODELIST c3 on c3.CODETYPE = 'JZJG' And c3.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' Left Join SYS_CODELIST_DETAIL c4 On c3.CODEID = c4.CODEID And c4.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' and t.jzjg = c4.CODE_VALUE WHERE t.DELETE_FLAG = 'N'

SELECT , c2.code_name jzsyxzmc, c4.code_name jzjgmc FROM YAGL_JXCS_JZXX t
Left Join SYS_CODELIST c1 on c1.CODETYPE = 'JZSYXZ' And c1.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' Left Join SYS_CODELIST_DETAIL c2 On c1.CODEID = c2.CODEID And c2.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' and t.jzsyxz = c2.CODE_VALUE
Left Join SYS_CODELIST c3 on c3.CODETYPE = 'JZJG' And c3.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' Left Join SYS_CODELIST_DETAIL c4 On c3.CODEID = c4.CODEID And c4.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' and t.jzjg = c4.CODE_VALUE WHERE t.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' AND t.jzid in (select jz.jzid from yagl_jxcs_jbxx_jzxx jz where jz.dwid=#{value})
